message: Accept this offer and we can call it a day, or I'll make a better offer next round!
I'm not impressed with your first offer. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You said I could do better, now it's my turn to show you I can!
You're getting closer, but I still think I can do better. Let's see what you're really willing to offer.
You're not getting the best deal, Bob. This is my last warning!
I'm not impressed with your 'last warning'. I'll give you one more chance to make a better offer, but this time I'll make a slightly worse one myself.
You're running out of chances, Bob. This is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
You're trying to get desperate, but I'm not falling for it. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think this is the end of it.
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my best offer yet. Don't make me regret it!
You're getting closer, but I still think I can do better. I'll give you one more chance to make a good offer, or I'll make a final, tough one.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing!
